issues.description: Type of attribute 'numberOfLoopings' in class RollerCoaster is declared as int in the UML/problem statement but implemented as double in the solution repository. This mismatch also affects the constructor parameter and getter signature, potentially confusing students about the expected data type.
issues.suggested_fix: Change the type of 'numberOfLoopings' in RollerCoaster (attribute, constructor parameter, and getter) from double to int to match the UML specification.
